alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 3:09AM CST until December 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Grundy, Southern Cook, Northern Will, Southern Will and Eastern Will Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Secure any outdoor decorations, including holiday decorations, and lighter outdoor furniture. Use caution when driving in windy conditions, especially on interstates and open roads.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
